meanings.definition: The beliefs or practices of a landlord.
meanings.sent1: Some landlordisms include strict rent collection policies.
meanings.sent2: She could tell from his landlordisms that he had experience in property management.
meanings.sent3: The landlordisms of always checking for property damages became a running joke among the tenants.
meanings.sent4: His landlordisms were like a set of rules engraved in stone.
meanings.sent5: The landlordisms of prompt maintenance requests made him a reliable property owner.

meanings.definition: The mannerisms or behaviors typical of a landlord.
meanings.sent1: One of his landlordisms was to always wear a suit when meeting tenants.
meanings.sent2: Her friendly landlordisms made her tenants feel at ease.
meanings.sent3: The landlordisms of carrying a clipboard everywhere gave him an air of authority.
meanings.sent4: His landlordisms of inspecting the property daily were like a ritual.
meanings.sent5: The landlordisms of offering a warm welcome to new tenants set a positive tone for the building.
